sentences.english: Qifeng, dark, a white woman, so I stood in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 凄风，苦雨，一个白衣女子，就这样在雨中痴痴站着。

sentences.english: You quickly forget about that beautiful guy you kept locking eyes with in the cappuccino line.
sentences.chinese: 你很快忘了买咖啡排队时让你痴痴凝望的漂亮男人。

sentences.english: Every day can only wait senselessly Equal.
Even in my dreams I'm an idiod to know to wake up to reality .
sentences.chinese: 甚至在梦里我也痴痴地想要醒来，回到现实中。

sentences.english: From then on, started cold, and often wait senselessly gaze all that.
sentences.chinese: 从此，开始了冷落，常痴痴的凝视着一切。

sentences.english: The girl is giggling at you.
We'll sing these stupid songs forever.
sentences.chinese: 我们会永远唱着这些痴痴的情歌。

sentences.english: Alone watching your avatar, has no courage to say a word of greeting.
sentences.chinese: 独自痴痴望着你的头像，却没有勇气说一句问候。

sentences.english: I was following my dream, journeying with the sun.
sentences.chinese: 日出即行，日落即息，痴痴地追寻着我的梦想。

sentences.english: The man at the oyster giggling, said to give her taking more photos.
sentences.chinese: 这个男人对着秀珍痴痴地笑，说要给她拍更多的照片。

sentences.english: He is still mooning over her.
Well, l'd love to, Little Koda, but can't keep the girls waiting.
sentences.chinese: 我是很想啦，小柯达，但我不能让女生们痴痴等我啊。

sentences.english: Laugh, he still wait, wait for an impossible dream.
sentences.chinese: 笑了，自己还痴痴傻傻，等待一个不可能的梦。

sentences.english: Muddleheaded , I'm waiting for the arrival of the dawn in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我在黑暗中痴痴的等待着黎明。

sentences.english: He hewed a canoe out of a tree trunk .
sentences.chinese: 他痴痴地靠着树干，望着眼前的一片新绿出神。

sentences.english: After seeing surface, I crazily entangle to u.
sentences.chinese: 见了一次面后，我却对你痴痴缠。

definition: to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
unable to take one's eyes off (idiom); to gaze steadily/to stare
